pages.text: $(l)Elemental affinities/$ are passive powers that only require one thing: 50% of paranormal exposure. These powers open many more possibilities for other powers, but it is only possible to receive affinity with one element. Furthermore, they offer considerable benefits, like resistance to the chosen element.
$(l)Powers with affinities/$ are enhanced versions of it's original counterpart, but they are only accessible to those with affinity with it's element.
